option.DisplayText: {{UD_FleshGolems_reanimated|Re-animatable Corpses}}: Start with the "Test Kit" for this mod.
option.helptext:
When enabled, the player will start each run with the mod's "Test Kit", which is just a mutation with the ability to raise the dead at will (with the ability to force them to join you), summon random corpses, and assess corpses for what they might have been in life.
This mutation is stupidly overpowered and shouldn't really be used to actually play with.
The default is {{w|Disabled}}.

When enabled, relevant conversation nodes will contain debug values appended to the end of them.
The default is {{w|Disabled}}.

option.DisplayText: Reduce frequency with which reanimated corpses {{UD_FleshGolems_reanimated|suffer endlessly}} (improves performance).
option.helptext:
When a large number of corpses are {{UD_FleshGolems_reanimated|endlessly suffering}} at once it can have quite a big impact on performance, since each turn each corpse rolls to take damage and then rolls to leak some gunk nearby.
When enabled the chance for any of these rolls to succeed is 2 orders of magnitude lower (divided by 100), which is significantly more performant.
The default is {{w|Disabled}}.

option.DisplayText: Set base odds (chance, 1 in) that an entity will spawn as a shambling {{UD_FleshGolems_reanimated|Reanimated}} creature.
option.helptext:
The base odds that the {{UD_FleshGolems_reanimated|Reanimated}} builder will be applied to {{Y|every}} reanimatable entity.
This option works {{G|immediately}}.
When this otion is set to 100, there is a 1 in 100 chance that the builder will be applied to an entity when it is created.
If this option is set to 1, {{Y|every entity}} that can spawn reanimated will spawn renaimated.
Set this option to {{W|0}} to {{w|disable}} the builder override (default rate for reanimated entities is 1 in 8000).
The default is {{W|0}}.

option.DisplayText: Set odds (chance, 1 in) multiplier that an entity will spawn as a shambling {{UD_FleshGolems_reanimated|Reanimated}} creature.
option.helptext:
The odds multiplier that the {{UD_FleshGolems_reanimated|Reanimated}} builder will be applied to {{Y|every}} reanimatable entity.
This option works {{G|immediately}}.
This option multiplies the base odds, so if the base odd are 100, and this option is set to 100, there is a 1 in 10,000 chance that an entity will be reanimated as it spawns.
The default rate (set by this mod) for reanimated entities is 1 in 8000 and is rolled entirely separately, so consider that 1 in 8000 twice is twice as likely when choosing this option.
Set this option to {{W|1}} to {{w|disable}} multiplying the odds.
The default is {{W|1}}.

option.DisplayText: Set base odds (chance, 1 in) that a corpse will reanimate as a shallow simulacrum of its former self.
option.helptext:
The base odds that the {{nanoneuro|Animated}} builder will be applied to {{Y|every}} corpse.
This option works {{G|immediately}}.
When this otion is set to 100, there is a 1 in 100 chance that the builder will be applied to a corpse when it is created.
If this option is set to 1, {{Y|every corpse}} that can spawn reanimated will spawn renaimated.
Set this option to {{W|0}} to {{w|disable}} the builder override (default rate for animated corpses is 1 in 3000).
The default is {{W|0}}.

option.helptext:

This option works {{G|immediately}}.
This option multiplies the base odds, so if the base odd are 100, and this option is set to 100, there is a 1 in 10,000 chance that a corpse will be animated as it spawns.
The default rate (set by this mod) for animated corpses is 1 in 3000 and is rolled entirely separately, so consider that 1 in 3000 twice is twice as likely when choosing this option.
Set this option to {{W|1}} to {{w|disable}} multiplying the odds.
The default is {{W|0}}.
